title: Bug 118780: Alias for columns in dataset not reflected in Expression Builder
OB: When setting alias for columns in a dataset, the Expression Builder still displays the old column names when selecting the dataset.
EB: The Expression Builder should reflect the updated alias names for columns when selecting the dataset.
SR:
To reproduce: 
1. Set alias for columns in a dataset. 
2. Open the Expression Builder. 
3. Select the dataset that has alias names for columns. 

Expected result: The Expression Builder should display the updated alias names for columns.
